name: HistoWiz
headline: Accelerating Histopathology for Cancer Research
description:
HistoWiz is an innovative company dedicated to accelerating pathology-based research.

HistoWiz provides fast, global access to digital whole-slide images, online collaboration tools, low-cost data management, and experimental pathology expertise. The web-based platform accelerates information exchange among medical scientists and research pathologists. HistoWiz's mission is to fight cancer cooperatively instead of individually by connecting scientists and pathologists for online collaboration.

The HistoWiz advantage
We help your lab minimize the cost of research and maximize research productivity by providing the most efficient service for scientists to analyze experimental pathology specimens. We believe that scientists should spend their time on results interpretation rather than repetitive tissue cutting.

How does it work?
HistoWiz accepts formalin-fixed specimens by mail for tissue processing services. To expedite delivery of results and to facilitate global collaboration, HistoWiz offers whole-slide imaging and pathology services, allowing researchers to remotely and instantly view high-magnification images of their specimens via a secure, cloud-based “virtual microscope” on any computer or mobile device without downloading any software or gigabyte-sized files.

# AUTOMATED HISTOPATHOLOGYFOR RESEARCHERS
Have your tissue specimens turned into high quality digital slides in just 3 days and get them analyzed by a [board-certified pathologist](http://histowiz.com/<https:/home.histowiz.com/telepathology/>)
**GLP and non-GLP services available.[Request an audit](http://histowiz.com/<https:/features.histowiz.com/glp-inquiry-form>).**
[SUBMIT ORDER](http://histowiz.com/<https:/app.histowiz.com/signup/>)
  * ![](https://unwavering-flower-58b50821d8.media.strapiapp.com/Histology_Services_2_23f03f8cdf.png)
Histology
High-quality results with expert-led tissue processing and slide generation in as few as 3 days.
[DISCOVER](http://histowiz.com/<https:/home.histowiz.com/histology/>)
  * ![](https://unwavering-flower-58b50821d8.media.strapiapp.com/Immunostaining_2_d961730586.png)

Advanced IHC and IF staining for protein visualization with 400+ antibodies validated.
[DISCOVER](http://histowiz.com/<https:/home.histowiz.com/immunostaining/>)

![Banner image](https://unwavering-flower-58b50821d8.media.strapiapp.com/Histo_Wiz_0224_069_d044099278.jpg)
## Fastest GLP-Compliant Histology Services in the Industry – Now Available at HistoWiz!
What sets us apart? Speed and precision. We understand that time is crucial in research, which is why we’ve built a fast, GLP-compliant workflow that guarantees quick delivery without compromising quality or regulatory standards. 
[REQUEST AUDIT](http://histowiz.com/<https:/features.histowiz.com/glp-inquiry-form>)
Instantly View, Manage, and Share Your Data
**Digital management meets increased discovery with[PathologyMap™](http://histowiz.com/<https:/home.histowiz.com/pathology_map/>).**
###### HistoWiz digitizes every stained slide with whole slide imaging (WSI) and stores the images on our intelligent, cloud-based platform for online viewing, annotation, sharing, and collaboration. [PathologyMap](http://histowiz.com/<https:/home.histowiz.com/pathology_map/>) hosts the largest collection of preclinical data to fuel AI-driven and QC tools to maximize your data’s quality and usage.
![pathology map](https://unwavering-flower-58b50821d8.media.strapiapp.com/pathmap_62064b67c747046f2d13d5c43f38b7e4_534c2a38f3.png)
## FEATURED CONTENT AND WEBINARS
  * POSTERMultiplex Immunofluorescence for Cancer Research[DOWNLOAD](http://histowiz.com/<https:/features.histowiz.com/multiplex-aacr-poster>)

  * WEBINARDeveloping Automated QC Tools to Enrich Histopathology Data and Assemble Targeted Datasets for Pathology Discoveries[WATCH](http://histowiz.com/<https:/features.histowiz.com/akash-pathology-webinar>)

Use our integrated Fedex shipping option when submitting an order. You can also deliver the samples to our facility.

generated_description:
HistoWiz is a New York-based company on a mission to revolutionize histopathology for cancer research. Founded as part of Y Combinator’s Batch W16, HistoWiz is all about collaboration—bringing together scientists and pathologists to expedite cancer research through a web-based platform that offers quick access to digital whole-slide images and various online tools.

Imagine sending a tissue specimen and having it processed within days instead of weeks—that's the HistoWiz promise. They maximize lab productivity by allowing researchers to focus on interpreting results rather than getting bogged down by repetitive tasks. With services like precision histology, immunostaining, slide archiving, and image analysis, they handle the nitty-gritty of tissue processing and analysis efficiently.

Their standout feature is the PathologyMap™, which digitizes stained slides, making them accessible from anywhere on a secure cloud platform. This means researchers can manage, annotate, and even collaborate on their findings in real-time, from any device. The platform also fuels AI-driven tools, enhancing data quality and usage.

HistoWiz operates with a lean team—just a couple of employees—yet they provide a wide range of services, pushing the boundaries of what’s possible in cancer diagnosis and research. They offer both GLP-compliant and non-GLP services, ensuring high regulatory standards without sacrificing speed. Their slogan succinctly captures their ethos: "Your goal is discovery. Our goal is to get you there faster."

In a nutshell, HistoWiz embodies the spirit of innovation and efficiency in the biotech space, making it easier for researchers to tackle complex cancer studies head-on. If you're in the field of cancer research, they are the ally you didn’t know you needed. Their website, where you can learn more and get started, is [histowiz.com](http://histowiz.com).
